doc:
Billy Barty https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Billy_Barty 0 Billy Barty (born William John Bertanzetti, October 25, 1924 – December 23, 2000) was an American actor and activist. In adult life, he stood three feet, nine inches (114 cm), due to cartilage–hair hypoplasia dwarfism, and because of his short stature, he was often cast in movies opposite taller performers for comic effect. He specialized in outspoken or wisecracking characters. During the 1950s, he became a television star, appearing regularly in the Spike Jones ensemble. Billy_Barty ( born William_John_Bertanzetti , October_25_,_1924 – December_23_,_2000 ) was an_American_actor_and_activist . In adult_life , he stood three_feet , nine_inches ( 114_cm_) , due to cartilage – hair_hypoplasia_dwarfism , and because_of his_short_stature , he was_often_cast in movies opposite_taller_performers for comic_effect . He specialized in outspoken_or_wisecracking_characters . During the_1950s , he became a_television_star , appearing regularly in the_Spike_Jones_ensemble .
